title: Cant install league
body: So i had league on my pc but i recently deleted it due to not having enough space on my C disk so i tried to install it on my D disk but whenever it reaches 9% the client closes and this keeps on happening everytime, is there a solution for this? :/

replies.body: Make sure your install is still being saved to a directory with enough space.  Should the issue persists then you could have security issues blocking the install.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eQR0MHL5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-21T16:47:33.650+0000)
>
> Make sure your install is still being saved to a directory with enough space.  Should the issue persists then you could have security issues blocking the install.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix that up.

so i tried everything in the permissions thing and now i get this: http://prntscr.com/h0blxh

EDIT: so i got this problem fixed, the issue was that my D disk was fat32 and once i changed it to NTFS i could install league properly
